---
category: news
title: "Protonic solid-state electrochemical synapse for physical neural networks"
excerpt: "Designing energy efficient neural networks based on synaptic memristor devices remains a challenge. Here, the authors propose the development of a 3-terminal WO3 synaptic device based on proton intercalation in inorganic materials by leveraging a solid proton reservoir layer PdHx as the gate terminal."
